page.title: 20The Royal Norfolk Showground
page.content: { Livestock}still plays an important part in the show, and is listed as one of the{main attractions.}Despite modern technological leisure pursuits the attendance has been and is {increasing,}although the{military {displays}are{much less popular (perhaps because of T.V coverage) and the{trade stands}have become much{more {popular.}The showground is used for many other{minor events}through the year including dog shows, cub and scout jamborees, gymkhanas and even the Anglian Bible week. In fact, the ground can be hired out for almost any event, but the{rules on trading are {very strict.}This is because it is a {charity organisation,}and of the 4\ thousand employees of the association, most of them are volunteers.
